thread.title: BRIEF-Hubei Huijin Plans To Acquire 70 Pct Stake In Beijing Technology Firm For 361.2 Mln Yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hubei Huijin Plans To Acquire 70 Pct Stake In Beijing Technology Firm For 361.2 Mln Yuan

organizations.name: reuters) - hubei huijin electromechanical co ltd

text:
Jan 22 (Reuters) - Hubei Huijin Electromechanical Co Ltd :
* SAYS IT PLANS TO ACQUIRE 70 PERCENT STAKE IN BEIJING TECHNOLOGY FIRM FOR 361.2 MILLION YUAN ($56.43 million)
* SAYS SHARE TRADE TO RESUME ON JAN 23 Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2Dqcp97 ; bit.ly/2DBOtmn Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.4009 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
